root.api_para: a:5:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:5:"state";s:5:"value";s:1:"2";s:10:"directions";s:128:"团购状态(1 => 未开始, 2 => 进行中(默认), 3 => 已结束(成功), 4 => 已结束，待处理, 5 => 已结束(失败))";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 1";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:5:"order";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:122:"排序方式(start_time => 开始时间, end_time => 结束时间(默认), price => 价格, last_modified => 最后更新)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:10:"order_type";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:30:"排序方式(DESC, ASC-默认)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:7:"page_no";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:22:"分页页码(默认:1)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"Number";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:9:"page_size";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:23:"分页大小(默认:20)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"Number";}}
